headline: Tapestry Confirms End of Merger Deal With Capri Holdings
summary: TPR pulls out of the merger with Capri, redirecting efforts toward expanding its business and enhancing shareholder value.

headline: Capri outlines return to growth plan as Tapestry merger falls apart
summary: Luxury fashion parent company of Coach and Kate Spade, Tapestry and global fashion luxury group Capri Holdings have mutually agreed to end their merger plans amid regulatory challenges.

raw.headline: Capri outlines return to growth plan as Tapestry merger falls apart
raw.summary: Luxury fashion parent company of Coach and Kate Spade, Tapestry and global fashion luxury group Capri Holdings have mutually agreed to end their merger plans amid regulatory challenges.

headline: Tapestry Ends Merger, Focuses on Growth and Buybacks
summary: Tapestry ( (TPR) ) just unveiled an announcement. Tapestry, Inc. announced the termination of its merger agreement with Capri Holdings Limited, focusing instead on accelerating organic growth and enhancing shareholder value. With a robust financial position, Tapestry plans to implement a $2 billion share repurchase program, partly through an accelerated share repurchase plan, while redeeming acquisition-related debt. headline: The Weekly Closeout: Target extends store hours for the holidays, Nuuly launches ‘The Thrift Shop’
summary: The mass merchant will be open from 7 a.m. to midnight from Nov. 30 to Dec. 23, while the subscription company debuted a perk for discounted styles.

headline: Tapestry and Capri mutually agree to terminate $8.5bn merger
summary: The companies decided to abandon the merger plans due to the uncertain outcome of ongoing legal proceedings.
